Post-Match Reflections: Ángel Di María commented on Argentina’s 1-0 win vs. Ecuador, stating that the pass from Cristian Romero was 'terrific' and that it was a 'deserved win.' He also mentioned that the team needs to continue working and staying united for the Copa America.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina will play Guatemala on Friday
Others: The article mentions that Lionel Messi and Lautaro Martínez each scored twice for Argentina in a 4-1 win vs. Guatemala in a previous match.
